item.title: Christine add a quote by John Churton Collins
item.description: "In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends." -- John Churton Collins

item.title: Christine add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Unfortunately, Susan didn't remember what Jane Fulton once said, 'Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Christine add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Christine add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Christine add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Christine add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "We do not have to visit a madhouse to find disordered minds; our planet is the mental institution of the universe." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Christine add a quote by Robert Francis Kennedy
item.description: "There are those who look at things the way they are and ask why... I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?" -- Robert Francis Kennedy

item.title: Christine add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Christine add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Christine add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Christine add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one’s definition of your life; define yourself." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Christine add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Christine add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing; a confusion of the real with the ideal never goes unpunished." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Christine add a quote by James Thurber
item.description: "Why do you have to be a nonconformist like everybody else?" -- James Thurber

item.title: Christine add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "I am not a member of any organized political party — I am a Democrat. " -- Will Rogers

item.title: Christine add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Time doth flit; oh shit." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Christine add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "What fresh hell is this?" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Christine add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I don't know much about being a millionaire, but I'll bet I'd be darling at it." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Christine add a quote by William F. Buckley
item.description: "Liberals claim to want to give a hearing to other views, but then are shocked and offended to discover that there are other views." -- William F. Buckley

item.title: Christine add a quote by Jonah Goldberg
item.description: "If there is ever a fascist takeover in America, it will come not in the form of storm troopers kicking down doors but with lawyers and social workers saying. "I'm from the government and I'm here to help." -- Jonah Goldberg

item.title: Christine add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand." -- Mae West
